intro: Stathmostelma spectabile subsp. spectabile, commonly known as the showy stathmostelma, is a flowering plant native to the southeastern United States. The plant typically grows in moist, woodland habitats and produces clusters of white to pale yellow flowers. Its leaves are lance-shaped and often have a distinctive waxy coating.
